channel.title: Need some help with editing .java files and stuff!
channel.description:
1). And i read some tuts, they said: "add this to your commands" How to make my own commands??!
2). I tried to edit my client.java for admin list and some other stuff, but it wouldnt come up with changes!
3). Where to make changes in what NPC's say? Like "Owner Floor66 is ONLINE / OFFLINE".
Thanx!

item.title: Need some help with editing .java files and stuff!
item.dc:creator: @adam2348 adam2348
item.description:
@adam2348 wrote:

any time u change anything in ur code, u have to compile it. that takes the .java source, that u edit, and makes it into .class (which is what ur server uses when it’s running)

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help with editing .java files and stuff!

item.title: Need some help with editing .java files and stuff!
item.dc:creator: @floor66 floor66
item.description:
@floor66 wrote:

well i edited it but it wouldnt work, do i need to ‘Compile’ it? or such?

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help with editing .java files and stuff!

item.title: Need some help with editing .java files and stuff!
item.dc:creator: @belbn belbn
item.description:
@belbn wrote:

to add a command just find your other ones in your client.java and add it there.

Read full topic
